Cabal Hermit.name: Reveal Soul
Cabal Hermit.description:
Reveal the blueish soul orb left by deceased thieves and adventurers.
Certain spells must be cast within proximity of a soul.

Cabal Hermit.name: Call to Elements
Cabal Hermit.description: Grants you a boon that varies according to your location when casting this spell.

Cabal Hermit.name: Mana Push
Cabal Hermit.description:
Spell which inflicts no damage but has High Impact in a wide area in front of the caster.
Can be combined with other spells for powerful effects.

Cabal Hermit.name: Weather Tolerance
Cabal Hermit.description:
Increases your Hot and Cold Weather Defense by 8.
Increases your Decay Resistance by 5.

Cabal Hermit.name: Shamanic Resonance
Cabal Hermit.description:
The effects of boons on you are increased.
For example, a boon that increases your Fire Resistance by 20 would increase it by 30 instead.

Cabal Hermit.name: Sigil of Wind
Cabal Hermit.description:
Required: Activated Wind Altar.
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

Cabal Hermit.name: Infuse Wind
Cabal Hermit.description:
Required: Activated Wind Altar.
Increases the Impact and Attack Speed of your melee weapon for 3 minutes.
Your stamina burn increases more quickly, however.

Cabal Hermit.name: Conjure
Cabal Hermit.description: Spell which does nothing on its own, but can be combined with other abilites.

Kazite Spellblade.name: Steady Arm
Kazite Spellblade.description: Increases Impact Resistance by 10 while you are blocking.

Kazite Spellblade.name: Shield Charge
Kazite Spellblade.description:
Required: Shield
Rush forward to hit foes with your shield for high Impact. Can hit the target twice.

Kazite Spellblade.name: Fitness
Kazite Spellblade.description: Increases your maximum Health by 25 and the amount of Health you restore while sleeping by 20%

Kazite Spellblade.name: Spellblade's Awakening
Kazite Spellblade.description: Increases your maximum Health, Stamina and Mana by 15 each

Kazite Spellblade.name: Infuse Fire
Kazite Spellblade.description: Temporarily adds fire damage to your melee weapon and inflicts Burning on enemies. Consumes your Warm boon.

Kazite Spellblade.name: Infuse Frost
Kazite Spellblade.description: Temporarily adds ice damage to your melee weapon and inflicts Slow Down on enemies. Consumes your Cool boon.

Kazite Spellblade.name: Gong Strike
Kazite Spellblade.description: Strike your weapon on your shield, removing the elemental infusion to make an explosion of that element.

Kazite Spellblade.name: Elemental Discharge
Kazite Spellblade.description:
Required: Infused Weapon
Shoot a projectile of the element that is infused on your weapon.

Mercenary.name: Shatter Bullet
Mercenary.description:
Required: Pistol, Iron Scraps
Load a bullet with high Impact which also inflicts Pain
Shooting it requires the use of the Fire/Reload skill.

Mercenary.name: Frost Bullet
Mercenary.description:
Required: Pistol, Cool Boon
Load the pistol with a bullet that makes a short-distance blast which slows enemies. Removes your Cool boon.
Shooting it requires use of the Fire/Reload skill.

Mercenary.name: Fast Maintenance
Mercenary.description: You repair your equipment 50% faster when you allocate time to Repairing in the rest menu.

Mercenary.name: Armor Training
Mercenary.description: Decreases the stamina and movement penalties from wearing armor by 50%.

Mercenary.name: Swift Foot
Mercenary.description: Your movement speed is increased by 10%

Mercenary.name: Shield Infusion
Mercenary.description: Block an elemental attack. When you next block, an elemental explosion will burst from you.

Mercenary.name: Blood Bullet
Mercenary.description:
Required: Pistol, Possessed Boon
Absorb the enemy's life into your pistol as a blood bullet, healing yourself.
Shooting it requires the use of the Fire/Reload skill.

Philosopher.name: Chakram Pierce
Philosopher.description:
Required: Chakram, Discipline Boon.
Launch the disc forward, possibly hitting the enemy twice. Discipline is required to cast this spell.

Philosopher.name: Chakram Arc
Philosopher.description:
Required:Chakram, Discipline Boon.
The disc sweeps the area in front of the caster, dealing high Damage and Impact. Discipline is required to cast this spell.

Philosopher.name: Sigil of Fire
Philosopher.description:
Consumes: Fire Stone
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

Philosopher.name: Mana Ward
Philosopher.description:
Envelops you in Mana and, for an instant, you become immune to Damage.
Can be combined with other spells for powerful effects.

Philosopher.name: Leyline Connection
Philosopher.description:
You regain 0.34 mana per second.
This is a constant effect

Philosopher.name: Chakram Dance
Philosopher.description:
Required: Chakram, Discipline Boon.
The disc sways left and right as it advances, hitting multiple times and dealing high damage. Discipline is required to cast this spell

Philosopher.name: Sigil of Ice
Philosopher.description:
Consumes: Cold Stone
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

Philosopher.name: Fire Affinity
Philosopher.description: Increase your resistance to Fire by 20% and the Fire damage you inflict is increased by 15%.

Rogue Engineer.name: Backstab
Rogue Engineer.description:
Required: Dagger
Dagger attack. If the attack hits the enemy's back, the damage and impact are tripled.

Rogue Engineer.name: Sweep Kick
Rogue Engineer.description: Weak attack with wide arc of effect and high impact. Will knock down a target afflicted by Confusion status effect.

Rogue Engineer.name: Pressure Plate Training
Rogue Engineer.description:
Enable you to deploy complex Pressure Plate Traps.
These traps are primarily armed with charges, which shoot poison, fire and more.

Rogue Engineer.name: Opportunistic Stab
Rogue Engineer.description: Dagger attack. If the enemy has the Pain or Confusion hex, this attack's damage and knockback are tripled. If it has both, it is 6 times stronger instead.

Rogue Engineer.name: Feather Dodge
Rogue Engineer.description: Lowers the Stamina cost of dodging by 50% and allows you to dodge unimpeded even when wearing a backpack.

Rogue Engineer.name: Serpent's Parry
Rogue Engineer.description:
Required: Dagger
Counter a physical attack with a strong dagger strike. Targets afflicted by Confusion are briefly stunned. Targets afflicted by Pain will be inflicted Extreme Bleeding.

Rogue Engineer.name: Stealth Training
Rogue Engineer.description:
Enemies will have a harder time spotting you.
Sprinting and having a light source will still easily alert them, though

Rogue Engineer.name: Pressure Plate Expertise
Rogue Engineer.description:
Increases the power of your Pressure Plate Traps.
Allows reuse of Pressure Plates after they have been triggered, though they must be re-armed with another charge or compatible item.

Rune Sage.name: Rune: Dez
Rune Sage.description: Blue rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes in the correct order.

Rune Sage.name: Rune: Egoth
Rune Sage.description: Purple rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes in the correct order.

Rune Sage.name: Rune: Fal
Rune Sage.description: Green rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes in the correct order.

Rune Sage.name: Rune: Shim
Rune Sage.description: Red rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes in the correct order.

Rune Sage.name: Arcane Syntax
Rune Sage.description: Gain access to more advanced runic combos.

Rune Sage.name: Internalized Lexicon
Rune Sage.description: Removes the need to have an equipped Lexicon in your off-hand to cast runic spells.

Rune Sage.name: Runic Prefix
Rune Sage.description: All runic spells are more powerful or have added effects

Warrior Monk.name: Focus
Warrior Monk.description:
Grants the discipline boon, which increases the physical damage of your attacks.
Using this skill burns a bit of your maximum stamina until the next time you sleep.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

Warrior Monk.name: Brace
Warrior Monk.description:
Blocks an attack, restoring your stability and giving you the Discipline boon.
All nearby enemies are knocked back.

Warrior Monk.name: Slow Metabolism
Warrior Monk.description: It takes more time for you to become hungry, thirsty and sleepy.

Warrior Monk.name: Perfect Strike
Warrior Monk.description:
Required: Any Melee Weapon, Discipline Boon.
Lunging attack that ignores all defenses and inflicts Pain.

Warrior Monk.name: Master of Motion
Warrior Monk.description: While under the effect of the Discipline boon, Impact Resistance and all damage resistances are increased by 10.

Warrior Monk.name: Flash Onslaught
Warrior Monk.description:
Required: Any Melee Weapon, Discipline Boon
Attack all enemies within a close distance with increased Damage and Impact. Using the skill consumes the Discipline boon.

Warrior Monk.name: Counterstrike
Warrior Monk.description:
Required: Any Melee Weapon
Completely block a physical attack, striking the attacker and dealing high Damage.

Wild Hunter.name: Evasion Shot
Wild Hunter.description:
Shoot an arrow while jumping backwards. Causes the Cripple status effect on the target.
Locking on foes is essential with this skill.

Wild Hunter.name: Enrage
Wild Hunter.description:
Grants the Rage boon, which increases the Impact of your attacks.
Using this skill burns a bit of your maximum health until the next time you sleep.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

Wild Hunter.name: Hunter's Eye
Wild Hunter.description: You can lock on enemies at longer distances when using a bow.

Wild Hunter.name: Sniper Shot
Wild Hunter.description: Let loose a very strong arrow shot with a long windup, making it a poor option in the middle of combat.

Wild Hunter.name: Predator Leap
Wild Hunter.description: Jumping attack that creates a shockwave upon landing, with high Impact and Damage.

Wild Hunter.name: Piercing Shot
Wild Hunter.description:
Required: Bow.
Strong shot that goes through enemies and hits other foes behind. Inflicts Extreme Bleeding.

Wild Hunter.name: Feral Strikes
Wild Hunter.description:
Required: Melee Weapon, Rage Boon
Attack twice, consuming your Rage boon in the process. Inflicts Extreme Bleeding and Pain.

Hex Mage.name: Jinx
Hex Mage.description: Inflicts a random Hex debuff on the target.

Hex Mage.name: Nightmares
Hex Mage.description: Reduces Max Mana burn from sleeping by 25%, reduces Max Stamina burn recovery by 25%

Hex Mage.name: Torment
Hex Mage.description: Triggers a related reaction in all nearby enemies afflicted with a Hex

Hex Mage.name: Bloodlust
Hex Mage.description: For every death around the caster, recover 5 max Health, Stamina and Mana burn.

Hex Mage.name: Blood Sigil
Hex Mage.description:
Consumes: Dark Stone
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

Hex Mage.name: Rupture
Hex Mage.description: Detonate all Hexes on nearby enemies, and all souls, for related damage.

Hex Mage.name: Cleanse
Hex Mage.description: Requires 50% Corruption and a Mana Stone. Creates a Dark Stone, removes 30% Corruption, suffer Extreme Bleeding and 65 Decay Decay damage.

Hex Mage.name: Lockwell's Revelation
Hex Mage.description: Increases Elemental Damage by 15% when Tired, and 30% when Very Tired.

The Speedster.name: Probe
The Speedster.description: A weak attack that increases Alertness level on hit. Evolves into stronger forms as Alertness level rises.

The Speedster.name: Metabolic Purge
The Speedster.description: Passive skill that increases Corruption resistance by 10%.

The Speedster.name: Daredevil
The Speedster.description: Reduce all skill Cooldowns by 10% per Alertness level.

The Speedster.name: Prime
The Speedster.description: Removes 2 Alertness levels, instantly resets the cooldown of the next skill used in the next 3 minutes.

The Speedster.name: Unerring Read
The Speedster.description: Removes 1 Alertness levels, cancels the next hit received in the next 20 seconds.

The Speedster.name: Blitz
The Speedster.description: Increases Sprinting speed by 5% and running attack damage by 10% per Alertness level.

The Speedster.name: Anticipation
The Speedster.description: Increases physical protection stat by 2 per Alertness level.

Primal Ritualist.name: Haunting Beat
Primal Ritualist.description:
Required: Ghost Drums in inventory.
Deploys the Ghost Drum and causes Haunted in a small radius. There can't be another Totem within 30 meters.

Primal Ritualist.name: Welkin Ring
Primal Ritualist.description: Required: Sky Chimes in inventory. Deploys the Sky Chimes and causes Doom in a small radius. There can't be another Totem within 30 meters.

Primal Ritualist.name: Miasmic Tolerance
Primal Ritualist.description: Increase Status Effect resistance by 15% when well rested.

Primal Ritualist.name: Nurturing Echo
Primal Ritualist.description:
Required: At least one deployed Totem within 15 meters.

Generates a bubble around nearby Totems that provide restoration of some kind. Lasts longer depending on how many Charges the Totem has built up.

Primal Ritualist.name: Reverberation
Primal Ritualist.description:
Required: Must be facing a Totem within 15 meters

Recalls a deployed totem to your inventory, and generates a zone of recurring damage. The size, damage type and duration depend on the Totem and how many Charges it has built up.

Primal Ritualist.name: Harmony and Melody
Primal Ritualist.description: Allows you to have both a Sky Chimes totem and a Ghost Drums totem active in close proximity of each other at the same time.

Primal Ritualist.name: Battle Rhythm
Primal Ritualist.description: Your deployed Sky Chimes increase Barrier by 5 and Ghost Drums increase Protection by 5 when within 8 meters. This bonus also applies to your allies.

Weapon Master.name: The Technique
Weapon Master.description: A strong counter with high impact that inflicts Extreme Bleeding on yourself and the enemy.

Weapon Master.name: Scalp Collector
Weapon Master.description: Inflicts Bleeding on hit. Finish off an enemy with this skill to gain the Kill Streak Buff, which grants bonus damage and speed.

Weapon Master.name: Dispersion
Weapon Master.description: Create a highly damaging shockwave that destabilizes you. If your Weapon has an elemental imbue, it uses that element and inflicts the associated Hex on foes.

Weapon Master.name: Moment of Truth
Weapon Master.description: A highly damaging strike that bypasses 50% of enemy resistances. Lowers your own resistances by 50% for 15 seconds.

Weapon Master.name: Warrior's Vein
Weapon Master.description: A strong counter with high impact that inflicts Extreme Bleeding on yourself and the enemy.

Weapon Master.name: Crescendo
Weapon Master.description: A quick strike that generates 1 stack of the Craze Buff on hit, which grants bonus damage. All stacks of Craze are lost if you are damaged.

Weapon Master.name: Vicious Cycle
Weapon Master.description: A high damage and high impact sweep that inflicts Cripple on enemies.

Weapon Master.name: Splitter
Weapon Master.description: A leaping strike that increases in power as the enemy's life % decreases, and uses the element infused on the weapon. You will evade all enemy attacks while performing this move.

Weapon Master.name: Strafing Run
Weapon Master.description: Run to the left or right while unleashing a storm of 5 arrows. Best used while locked onto a target.

Weapon Master.name: Vital Crash
Weapon Master.description: A long distance running tackle that does more damage the more Health % you have and more impact the more Stamina % you have. Inflicts Confusion and Pain on you.

Specialist.name: Brains
Specialist.description: Increases Elemental Damage by 15%, but lowers physical damage by 25% and increases Stamina costs by 15%

Specialist.name: Brawns
Specialist.description: Increase Physical Damage by 25% and increase max stamina by 25, but lowers elemental damage by 40%.

Specialist.name: Unsealed
Specialist.description: Speed up Sigil placement skills and extend the duration of Sigils by 20 seconds. Lower max life by 25.

Specialist.name: Patience
Specialist.description: Increase damage from Weapon Skills by 30% but lower the damage from normal and special attacks by 20%

Specialist.name: Acrobatics
Specialist.description: Unhampered Dodge Rolls have increased range. Stamina cost of Dodge Rolls increased by 50%

Specialist.name: Cruelty
Specialist.description: Increase damage of your Burning, Poison, Extreme poison by 50% and increase the damage of Bleeding, Extreme Bleeding, Blaze, Holy Blaze and Plague by 30%. Lower status resistances by 50% and Physical resistance by 10%.

Quests Active.name: Spark
Quests Active.description:
Tiny fire explosion that deals negligible damage, but can be used in combination with other spells for greater effects.
This spell can light campfires.

Quests Active.name: Infuse Blood
Quests Active.description: Infuses your weapon with the Decay element, as well as Extreme Poison and Extreme bleeding. Leeches 10% of damage dealt into your HP. Costs 20 Life to activate.

Quests Active.name: Infuse Light
Quests Active.description: Temporarily adds lighting damage to your melee weapon, also making the weapon a useful light source. Consumes your Blessed boon.

Quests Active.name: Infuse Mana
Quests Active.description: Infuses your weapon with the Ethereal element.

Quests Active.name: Possessed
Quests Active.description:
Grants the Possessed boon, which increases your Decay Damage and Decay Resistance by 20%.
Certain skills require this boon to be active

Quests Active.name: Chill Hex
Quests Active.description: Inflicts Chill on touch.

Quests Active.name: Curse Hex
Quests Active.description: Inflicts Curse on touch.

Quests Active.name: Pommel Counter
Quests Active.description: Counter an attack with a high Impact strike using the sword's pommel. Inflicts Confusion and can chain into melee attacks.

Quests Active.name: Mist
Quests Active.description: Grants the Mist boon, which increases your Ethereal Damage and Ethereal Resistance. Certain skills require this boon to be active.

Quests Active.name: Flamethrower
Quests Active.description:
Required: Torch or Lantern
Shoots fire from the torch or lantern, which also inflicts the Burning status effect. This skill lowers the durability of the torch or lantern used.

Quests Active.name: Simeon's Gambit
Quests Active.description: Deflect a melee attack and counter with a powerful strike. You will still strike if no attack was deflected, but for less damage.

Quests Active.name: Puncture
Quests Active.description: Close combat attack which deals high Damage and Impact, and inflicts Pain.

Quests Active.name: Prismatic Flurry
Quests Active.description: Does an extra hit for each Elemental Boon active.

Quests Active.name: Blessed
Quests Active.description:
Grants a Blessed boon, which increases your Lightning Damage and Lightning Resistance.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

Quests Active.name: Talus Cleaver
Quests Active.description: Low blow that reduces the target's mobility. Inflicts Pain and Cripple.

Quests Active.name: Haunt Hex
Quests Active.description: Inflicts Haunted on touch and 25 Impact Impact

Quests Active.name: Execution
Quests Active.description: High Damage and Impact strike that deals twice its Damage against knocked down foes.

Quests Active.name: Cool
Quests Active.description:
Grants the Cool boon, which increases your Frost Damage and Frost Resistance. It also increases your protection to hot weather.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

Quests Active.name: Warm
Quests Active.description:
Grants the Warm boon, which increases your Fire Damage and Fire Resistance. It also increases your protection to cold weather.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

Quests Active.name: Juggernaut
Quests Active.description: Slow but powerful melee attack that inflicts Confusion. Increases your Impact Resistance during this attack.

Quests Active.name: Mace Infusion
Quests Active.description: Block an elemental attack, infusing your weapon with that element.

Quests Active.name: Scorch Hex
Quests Active.description: Inflicts Scorched on touch and 25 Impact Impact

Quests Active.name: Moon Swipe
Quests Active.description: Double attack that deals high damage, and that increases in power if you have the Rage or Discipline boons.

Quests Passive.name: Acceptance
Quests Passive.description: Increases your Cold and Hot Weather Defense by 8.

Quests Passive.name: Alchemical Experiment
Quests Passive.description: Increases all Damage you deal by 15%.

Quests Passive.name: Divine Assistance
Quests Passive.description: Reduces the Stamina and Mana costs of your actions by 10%.

Quests Passive.name: Elatt's Intervention
Quests Passive.description: Increases Barrier by 2 and Protection by 5

Quests Passive.name: Exalted
Quests Passive.description:
Double all the Damage you deal. Reduce the Stamina and Mana costs of your actions by 30%. Increase all Damage Resistances by 10.
You are inflicted with the incurable Life Drain Sickness.

Quests Passive.name: Kirouac's Breakthrough
Quests Passive.description: Increases max Health by 25 and Physical damage by 15%.

Quests Passive.name: Logistics Expert
Quests Passive.description: Reduce all skill Cooldowns by 10%, increase movement speed by 5% and increase pouch capacity by 5.

Quests Passive.name: Peacemaker Elixir
Quests Passive.description: Increases your maximum Health, Stamina and Mana by 20.

Quests Passive.name: Preferential Treatment
Quests Passive.description: Lower buying prices and increase selling prices.

Quests Passive.name: Sanctified Assistance
Quests Passive.description: Reduces the Stamina and Mana costs of your actions by 5%.

Quests Passive.name: Spiritual Communion
Quests Passive.description: Increases your Ethereal, Lightning and Decay damage by 10%.
